sentences.sContent: But there's no reason that business can't be a major part of the climate change solution, or that profit isn't concordant with a desire to save the Earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there's no reason that business can't be a major part of the climate change solution, or that profit isn't concordant with a desire to save the Earth.
sentences.sCn: 其实气候变化的解决方案完全有条件可以成为一笔大生意，它的利润与拯救地球的期望相比，是完全协调的。

synos.tran: 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的

remMethod.val: con (共同) + cord (心) + ant (…的) → 同心的 → 一致的 → 协调的

words.tran: 调和，一致；用语索引；著作或作家全集的重要用字索引

trans.tranCn: 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的
trans.tranOther: being in agreement or having the same regular pattern
